name: sol
description: Take a look at the function `loadScript(src)`, that loads a script with the given `src`:

scripts.publish: git ci -am 2020 && git push origin master
scripts.private: git ci -am private-2020 && git push private private
scripts.start: npm run build; cd dist && http-server
scripts.gh-pages: npm run build && gh-pages -d dist -b gh-pages

author: Casiano Rodriguez-Leon <crguezl@ull.edu.es> (https://github.com/crguezl)
